betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Each point of naturally volatile source matter in your crucible, smelter, and other production equipment increases the spellwave by the corresponding value (more so for corrupted elements), and the presence of the spellwave in the aura field slows down the recovery of the aura field's aura and reduces the efficiency of the aura's recovery. 

When the spell wave is higher than 75% of the aura field's aura, the spell wave rift will appear, and it will devour the cubes it touches (e.g. chests, furnaces, ME drives, etc.), destroying the drops, so don't let it appear! 

When using the Crucible, be careful to precipitate excess source matter using Quartz Shards, each of which can precipitate two points of source matter, which can artificially control the emission of spellwaves. 

Of course, there are ways to reduce spell waves in the aura field, which we'll get to later.
